name: Linda_(Twin_Peaks)
text:
Linda (Twin Peaks)
For the motel guest, see Linda (motel).
Linda was Mickey's wife, who lived in the New Fat Trout Trailer Park in Twin Peaks, Washington.
Biography
Linda was a disabled veteran. She requested a motorized wheelchair to help her get around more easily, which took six months to arrive. One day, Mickey rode into Twin Peaks with Bill and Carl Rodd to pick up Linda's mail.
